name: Meaty Thick Man Chili
author: MISSCANADA
summary: Contrary to the title, it doesn't have men in it. However it is a man's best friend, it's thick, not as tomato-ey as most chili's. Best served with fresh bread.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1  green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1  red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
directions: Place the ground beef in a large pot over medium-high heat
Cook, stirring to crumble, until evenly browned
Place the pot over medium heat, and add the onion, garlic, green pepper, red pepper and kidney beans
Cook and stir for a few minutes
Stir in the tomato sauce and water, and season with chili powder
Simmer over low heat for 40 minutes uncovered
